body.name: Gyfimoie 6 Drawer Double Dresser with Power Outlet, Accent Chests of Drawers with LED Light, Modern White Storage Dresser with Charging Station, (Mirror Not Included) (White)
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
features: Dresser with Charge Station -No more hunting for a spot to charge devices. Gyfimoie 6 Drawer Dresser features USB ports and outlets.The outlet has 2 plug ins plus 2 USB ports, That makes things so much easier for you if you don't have many outlets in you room. You can use them to plug in your hairdryer / straight iron.

Storage Dresser Chest with LED Light - This 6 Drawer Double Dresser comes with beautiful multi-color RGB led light. You can control the light strip through the included remote or APP to freely change in 16 million colors,adjust brightness, or customize modes (Flashing,Jump,Fade,etc) in different speeds. The lights are great for every kind of mood.We can turn on the LED and not disturb the other or our baby by bumping into anything.

Elegant Look with Ample Storage Space - How the unit looks pretty sleek and the drawers don’t have any handles, so it’s not obvious they are even there, which further adds to the aesthetic appeal. While ensuring a beautiful look, this drawer dresser also provides ample storage space. It has 6 large drawers that allow you to classify and store your clothes. Additionally, there are two open storage spaces at the top of the dresser to ensure everything you need is always within reach.

Multifunctional Drawer Dresser - This dresser features Universal design to match any nursery or kids bedroom, can be used as kids bedroom dresser. Its ample storage space and sorting function make it perfectly match your cloakroom, and you can transform your dresser organizer into a multipurpose clothing storage station. That come with the charging station and LED lights make it both usable as a nightstand or night light in the bedroom

High-Quality Construction with Water-Based Paint - This dresser features sturdy drawers with high-quality metal slide rails, ensuring smooth and noise-free operation in your daily use. Additionally, the dresser is finished with water-based paint, providing a superior texture and appearance while prioritizing the health and safety of your family. To further enhance safety, the drawer storage comes with an anti-tip device, preventing children from climbing and toppling the dresser. With these features, you can enjoy both the quality and safety of this furniture piece, bringing peace of mind to your family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Voice of Customers Awesome 6 - drawer dresser I really love this unusual dresser. Its 6 drawers provide ample storage space, while the LED lights add a modern atmosphere to the room. LED is controlled through mobile app, with multiple modes to choose from, and it can even change lights according to the rhythm of music, I think this is a very cool feature. The built-in power outlet also makes it convenient for me to charge various devices when using it. Love it!
Multifunctional Drawer Storage Dresser - Meeting your different needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dresser with built in surge box
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The box was heavy and needed two people to carry it to upper level. The assembly looked daunting and had many parts. However once I started to put it together, it went pretty fast and very smooth. One person can complete the assembly. As most steps were repetitive, it didn’t seem tedious. Instructions were very clear. All tools needed were included and I used my power driver to make it easier and faster. The back boards and under boards for draws are thin but not too flimsy. Rest of the dresser was all thick material. Once assembled it looks really nice. The in built power outlets are a plus. Very convenient and it has two usb ports too. The color changing lights add a nice touch to the dresser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just takes awhile to build
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good dresser, the drawers aren’t deep but I didn’t need it to hold a lot of clothes. It does take forever to build and make sure you have a power tool! Overall it’s sturdy and beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really sturdy and useful dresser
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This came on time and had a good manual for installation. The dresser looks good has a nice color and all the drawers are of good size and useful. The height is proper and the lights are an additional feature. The quality is good for the price also has additional screws that can be fixed to wall if required. The mobile app for light is straightforward. Overall a good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was unable to put the dresser together due to the bolts breaking on me and the dresser bring unable to support the weight of the wood. After 3 hrs of working on puting it together I was unsuccessful. Waste of money and time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, minimalist and smooth
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve put together too many furniture items within the last year or so and I’ve gotta say that what pleases me the most about this dresser is how smooth its drawers function. Most times, I end up complaining of drawers not sliding smoothly or not getting all the way to the back. These ones, they all do function perfectly. That being said, assembly was not the easiest of all, not super complicated but a bit lengthy and it certainly requires two people. Every piece was properly marked and it brought extra of almost every screw in case you mess them up. It took me about an hour more than I expected it to assembly. Overall, it looks very very nice, boards seems sturdy and good quality. I was impressed that, in contrast with other items I’ve purchased before, the led lights had its own craved into the Board canal, in which they fit perfectly and even brought little flaps to keep it inside the rail, so very little chances the led strip would fall or detach. Overall, I’m pleased with the look, quality and functionality. I could use s bit more height in each drawer space but for the purpose of clothes, underwear, etc worked very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent , should cost less , looks smaller than pics
reviews.reviewText: Decent quality, nice looking ofcourse. Did come with the outlet cracked but no big deal. Eventhough the measurements are there not everyone is a carpenter so I went by photos and it is smaller than the photos depict. Check the videos others posted which I saw after that could've helped👍.Have a drill there are so many screws n another hand definitely will help I did it alone and at times u cant connect things in together without leveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks bigger than it is
reviews.reviewText: If you like this, be sure to look at the measurements of the drawers first to be sure it meets your need. I shamefully did not, this was for one of my kids room so was not too worried about it. The drawers are pretty small but as listed on the page, so that’s on me. The other issue was that there were several scapes (below paint) and some micro scratches in the paint, most likely during shipping and friction. I contacted the seller and they were fast to respond to help take care of the issue. That’s why I’m giving this the 4 stars instead of 1. Also, my son loves it, we mounted his tv on the wall above and the top led boxes are big enough to fit his Xbox and controlllers on one side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The dresser wood is really very heavy it took 2 of us to lift it up when i was assembling it. The instructions are bit puzzling though to putit together and it took me lil time to putit together. However, i was able to do it. It doesn’t trip without even putting anything in the drawers,as it heavy.The drawers are and hinges it comes with are smooth and strong and comes out and goes in very easily. I filled it up with my son’s clothes and it got but heavy and even than i was able to move the drawers easily. Moving it across will be difficult and would need coupe of people to lift. The wood didn’t chip while screwing which happens with me often with poorly engineered wood.The finish is elegant and looks and feel nice but I wish i would have come with handles on the drawers as it get tough when the drawers are full with clothes
